participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and competitive, she enjoys physical activities and has a straightforward approach to life.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i don't care about fashion. i hate the color orange.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and sociable, he enjoys spending time with his family and coaching kids.
participant_2.background: i drive a mini van. coffee is my preferred beverage. i coach little league baseball. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i've five sons.
